page.title: 06A Day At School
page.content: We start school by having a little playtime. Then when the bell goes at 9 o'clock we line up. We go in and start with{reading}then we do{English or{Maths.}On Tuesday ,Wednesday , Thursday and Friday we have {assembly. Then it's play.We have play for 15 minutes.Then go into class and do some maths.At 12.05 we have{dinner}but first have a little play.Then they call us in by our tables.Then after dinner we have a big play some of us have to stack the chairs.Then bell goes and we go to class.We do{art.}At 2.30 we have play then it's class.We end art and clean up the class then.We put up our chairs and go home at 3.30 We usually take the{bus.}There are two buses which go around our houses.
